body: What? When there is an error 404 it says 500? is this just a cruel joke or what?
body_tagged: What? When there is an error 404 it says 500? is this just a cruel joke or what?
title: [Answered] Error 404 - 500

replies.body:
Error 500 means that there is an Internal server error.
As in, an error on Avicus' part.

This can occur when the website is down for maintenance for example.
